name: Gallantry Gallop
description:
"Tally-oh to all sirs and madams! "

In Gallantry Gallop, four most-honored guests must win the race, but not at the cost of disrespecting High Host Lord Manderly! A quirky party racing game for 1 to 4 players (Xbox 360 controllers required).

______

Rules:

  1. Players each play one of many festive goat riders competing in a friendly race.
  2. The rider with the most points at the end of the race is declared the winner!
  3. Alas! there are many different ways to earn or lose points!
  4. Earn points by saluting dames most fair, done by pressing the colored button corresponding to their own color.
  5. Watch out! You can lose points by:
    • Passing Lord Manderly in the race! (How dare you?)
    • Wrongly saluting dames! (Improper!)
    • Colliding with the dames! (Most foul!)
    • Hitting priceless vases! (They are priceless!)

Controls:

  • Left Joystick (Up/Down): Switch tracks.
  • Right Bumper: Accelerate.
  • X, Y, A, B buttons: Trigger Polite actions.

______

"May the best gallantry win the day! Tally-oh!"
